alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:04PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lake County through 345 PM MDT... At 303 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Point, or 10 miles north of Polson, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Seek shelter if you are on Flathead Lake. Locations impacted include... Polson, Rocky Point, Kings Point, Big Arm, Jette, Elmo, Finley Point, Dayton, and Rollins. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 63 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region
